title: How many games will it take for me to learn how to play with unlocked camera?
body:
I have been playing for ages now with the camera locked, I have bound the unlock key to the side of my mouse so I can unlock very easy when I need to but I still play more with the camera locked than unlocked, I was wondering what is the best way to use unlocked camera more? should I just play lots of bot games with only unlocked or should I just try and use unlocked as much as I can but still use locked a little bit? any tips help :)
Thank you. :)

replies.body:
for me

just play normally, no needs for bots
you will eventually get used to it 


I used to be locked all the time when i was new, now i go half-half
sometimes i go unlocked, sometimes i go locked (i used space to lock/unlock , similar to your mouse)

About 6 games (for me).

The default controls have Spacebar as "lockscreen" when you hold it down, so in teamfights and when necessary, I hold down space. The thing about playing with unlocked is knowing where to centre your screen to get the best view of where you are.

get into the habbit of scoping your surrounding alot more, the pros use locked camera in teamfights especially adc's but if you watch them during streaming when they are in laning phase they use unlocked simply because they are able to look at a larger portion of the map and they are able to cover more of the map quicker around them (side bushes, junglers off to the side etc)

Its a good ability to have playing with a unlocked camera, tbh i cant see how u can see a gank coming if u dont play with unlocked camera unless your camping the minimap with your eyes

oh and to answer your question, just start playing with it unlocked, give it a few games and youll forget about locked/unlocked all together.
